Semantic Web SAPERE 0.0.1 API

Packages
it.apice.sapere.api This package is the root of all SAPERE system interfaces.
it.apice.sapere.api.impl This package contains the implementation of the SAPERE API.
it.apice.sapere.api.internal This package contains some utility class and Activator (?).
it.apice.sapere.api.lsas This package contains the definition of a Live Semantic Annotation (LSA) and relatives.
it.apice.sapere.api.lsas.impl This package contains the implementation of the SAPERE API (.lsas).
it.apice.sapere.api.lsas.values This package contains the definition of property values supported types.
it.apice.sapere.api.lsas.values.impl This package contains the implementation of the SAPERE API (.lsas.value).
it.apice.sapere.api.lsas.visitor This package contains the definition of an LSA visitor.
it.apice.sapere.api.space This package contains LSA-space interfaces.
it.apice.sapere.api.space.observation This package contains LSA-space observation features.
it.apice.sapere.lsas.visitors.impl This package contains the implementation of the services required to handle an LSA-space (.lsas.visitors).
it.apice.sapere.space  
it.apice.sapere.space.impl This package contains the implementation of the services required to handle an LSA-space (.space).
it.apice.sapere.space.internal This package contains Bundle Activator.
it.apice.sapere.space.observation.impl This package contains the implementation of the services required to handle an LSA-space (.space.observation).
